question_text: Which of the following must be true for a tone generator and probe to function correctly?
answer_options: The tone signal must be encoded in binary
The cable must be disconnected from power and equipment
The tone must be injected into the network switch
The probe must pierce the cable insulation
correct_answer: The cable must be disconnected from power and equipment
explanation: Tone generators are designed for use on unpowered lines. Live cables connected to active devices can damage the tools or yield inaccurate results.
